perturbation.original_text: 1.3 Subject to Section 8.3, Distributor's right to market, distribute and sell the Products in the Territory shall be exclusive. Distributor shall not sell any Products to a customer if Distributor knows or has reason to believe that such customer intends to remove those Products from the Territory. Distributor acknowledges and agrees that STAAR retains the right to sell the Products in the Territory directly or indirectly, including but not limited to via electronic commerce (without compensation to the Distributor). The Distributor shall cooperate with STAAR in servicing corporate accounts for customers operating in multiple Territories.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.3 Subject to Section 8.3, Distributor's right to market, distribute and sell the Products in the Territory shall be exclusive. Distributor shall not sell any Products to a customer if Distributor knows or has reason to believe that such customer intends to remove those Products from the Territory. Distributor acknowledges and agrees that STAAR may choose to give the Distributor some compensation, at their discretion. The Distributor shall cooperate with STAAR in servicing corporate accounts for customers operating in multiple Territories.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly stated that STAAR retains the right to sell the Products in the Territory directly or indirectly, including but not limited to via electronic commerce (without compensation to the Distributor). The modified version removes the certainty by introducing 'STAAR may choose to give the Distributor some compensation, at their discretion,' making it unclear when the Distributor would be compensated.

perturbation.original_text: 3. Term The term of this Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and terminate in _____________, on _____________, unless terminated earlier pursuant to the terms of this Agreement; provided, however, that this Agreement may be renewed for successive one (1) year periods if STAAR and Distributor expressly agree in writing and in their sole discretion to renew this Agreement prior to the foregoing termination date or any successive renewal term.
perturbation.changed_text: 3. Term The term of this Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and terminate in _____________, on _____________, unless terminated earlier pursuant to the terms of this Agreement; provided, however, that this Agreement will be renewed automatically for successive one (1) year periods. STAAR will review the performance of the distributor to determine if the agreement will continue after the initial year.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly stated that the agreement may be renewed for successive one (1) year periods if STAAR and Distributor expressly agree in writing. The modified version removes the certainty by introducing 'this Agreement will be renewed automatically for successive one (1) year periods' which directly contradicts the need for an agreement to be renewed.

perturbation.original_text: 14.3 Notwithstanding the provisions of Section 3 above, either party shall have the right to terminate this Agreement, without cause, upon no less than ninety (90) days' prior written notice to the other party.
perturbation.changed_text: 14.3 Notwithstanding the provisions of Section 3 above, only STAAR shall have the right to terminate this Agreement, without cause, upon no less than ninety (90) days' prior written notice to the other party.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly stated that either party shall have the right to terminate this Agreement, without cause, upon no less than ninety (90) days' prior written notice to the other party. The modified version removes the right for either party to terminate and gives the power of termination to STAAR only.
